Eligibility for VR&E Services Based on 38 CFR 3.324
A Veteranâ€™s entitlement to compensation under
38 CFR 3.324
satisfies the 10-percent evaluation requirement, even though a statutory award under

or former subsection
38 U.S.C. 1114(q)

title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 5, Section A - Veteran Readiness and Employment (VR&E) Eligibility
